headline.main: Business and the Law; Expectations In Cigarette Case

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: HALFWAY through a trial in Lexington, Miss., lawyers representing the survivors of a cigarette smoker are convinced that they have made the strongest case yet against the tobacco industry.
